alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:08AM AKST until February 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches west of Beaver. Snow accumulation from Beaver east 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near blizzard conditions expected on summits along the Dalton Highway and Steese Highway. Heaviest snowfall will be west of Beaver.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
